# Government Tender Announcement: Request for Custom Wood Furniture for Parliamentary Office Units

## Title and Reference

* English Title: Request for Information (RFI) for Custom Wood Furniture for Parliamentary Office Units
* French Title: Demande de Renseignements (DDR) concernant la Fabrication de Meubles en Bois Sur Mesure pour les Unités de Bureau Parlementaires
* Reference Number: WS3861654761
* Solicitation Number: WS3861654761
* Publication Date: February 14, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: March 10, 2023, at 14:00 EDT

## Request for Information

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites suppliers to provide information regarding the fabrication timeline of custom wood furniture for the Parliamentary Office Units (POUs).

## Contract Details

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive, Selective Tendering
* Unspsc Code: 56000000 (Furniture and Furnishings)
* Regions of Delivery: The National Capital Region (NCR)

## Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

## Contact Information

* Contact Name: Brittany Wood
* Contact Email: [brittany.wood@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:brittany.wood@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Additional Information

* Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15404835?extsite=MTU0MDQ4MzVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Amendment: The closing time of the RFI response deadline has been amended to March 10, 2023, at 14:00 EDT. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by this date.

Note: The Notice URL provided above is a link to the original tender announcement on the Ariba Discovery website. Suppliers interested in this RFI are encouraged to review the original posting for additional details and requirements.
